translations: v．模仿，扮演：模仿某人的言行举止，以达到娱乐或欺骗的目的。
· He impersonated the president in the comedy show.
他在喜剧节目中模仿总统。

sentences.sentence: Which will execute the Directory calls under the token of the impersonated user.
sentences.translation: 这将要求执行目录下的模拟用户令牌。

sentences.sentence: Let students draw the simple cartoon images in exaggeration or impersonated ways.
sentences.translation: 运用夸张、拟人手法创作简单的卡通形象。

sentences.sentence: Any configuration mistakes will result in an environment where any user can be impersonated.
sentences.translation: 任何配置失误都会导致环境可被任何用户模拟。
